name: Divân-ı Lügati't-Türk Derlemesi
short_description: The Compendium of Turkic languages (divan-i lugat'it-turk) is a valuable source of knowledge of various medieval Turkish dialects. This project adds old Turkic (also East Old Turkic, Orkhon Turkic, Old Uyghur) compilations to this compendium.
